short_summary: Aviation repair parts for C-17 Globemaster
full_summary:
**Aviation Replacement Parts for C-17 Globemaster**
==============================================

**Reference Number**
-------------------

 cb-567-93773056

**Solicitation Number**
-------------------

 W8485-248027/B

**Pre-Solicitation Details**
-------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the supply of aviation replacement parts for the C-17 Globemaster. The solicitation is covered by Supply Arrangement (SA) W8485-184741 Series.

**Supplier Eligibility**
----------------------

Only suppliers who are qualified for SA W8485-184741 Series may submit a proposal. The following companies have been invited to participate:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* B S F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc.
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
* Tulmar Safety
* Canada West Avionics
* Honeywell Ltd
* Mattis Aerospace
* M1 Composites Technology
* Rockwell Collins Canada
* S3 Aerodefense
* TSL Aerospace Technologies
* AllClear Aerospace and Defence Inc.
* CASP
* Bristow

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**
----------------------------------------

This procurement notice is posted in accordance with the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS). The notice includes a brief overview of the procurement requirements, supplier eligibility, and other key details.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For inquiries regarding this solicitation, suppliers should contact Ivan Khanzadeev at:

Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca

**Note**
----

This solicitation is subject to the ongoing opportunity for qualification program. Suppliers who are interested in becoming qualified for SA W8485-184741 Series should submit their request to the Supply Arrangement Authority:

Edmond Egikian, Supply Team Leader
Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG

Note: Edmond Egikian can be contacted at edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Solicitation Details**
----------------------

* Solicitation Number: W8485-248027/B
* Request for Proposal (RFP) Name: Aviation Replacement
